name: Be A Slime
description: “Be A Slime” is an idle tycoon game with a 2D art style graphics, You need to treat them as your pocket sized pet, You need to increase their population as many as you can but to able to do this you need to choose the proper number of the slimes to make them stay alive, There's a red monster roaming around that will kill and eat your slime and also to stop increasing the population, The slime has different purposes so you must choose wisely.
